name: Asociatia pentru Promovarea Educatiei Deschise
goal:
APED mission is to promote open education to everyone. Every child have the right to acces a quality education and for this purpose, schools have to be connected, educational content should be available in mother tongue also and teacher have to be professional.
Also, national systems have to take into account big date in order to have real time information and to be able to calibrate their intervention properly.
Civil society should be properly informed and acces to public information have to be easy.
For this things, APED is going to work now and in the future.
interests: Culture, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Information Society, Research and Technology, Sport, Youth
